Articles.Content:
![LQfeXgW.png](http://i.imgur.com/LQfeXgW.png)

I have Near future propulsion and Near Future Electrical, and the whole stock and mod parts won't appear.

Also the Log

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/8gg5h49675gvqtc/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/8gg5h49675gvqtc/output_log.txt?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-23T17:44:23Z" title="05/23/2015 05:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 23, 2015</time> by ouion**

I saw that recently, if you removed an addon that changes the tech tree it will break the save file, usually module manager is used for this so open your persistent.sfs and search for "modulemanager", delete that line and save your file, then load the save in KSP.

Has anyone tried this and did it work?

This is the only section I find with modulemanager:

 CAREER

 {

 TechTreeUrl = GameData\ModuleManager.TechTree

 StartingFunds = 250000

 StartingScience = 0

 StartingReputation = 0

 FundsGainMultiplier = 2

 RepGainMultiplier = 2

 ScienceGainMultiplier = 2

 FundsLossMultiplier = 0.5

 RepLossMultiplier = 0.5

 }

Do I delete this whole section?
